I remember watching him speak on the House floor( via C-SPAN) and I remarked to my husband, I don't know who this guy is but he looks presidential. From that point I kept an eye on him and to date he has not disappointed. I would say that of the known GOP candidates at this point, Mike Pence is the most attractive to me in

- without the caustic presence of British judge Simon Cowell . Simon Cowell , the contest's biggest star, quit in May to launch his own talent show on Fox later in 2011. In a column headlined The end of American Idol( for real this time), Newsweek blogger Ramin Setoodeh wrote:`` The entire franchise has gone to the land of Stepford, where everybody is so nice and sweet and happy and zippy, you feel a cavity coming on.''

Debbie Wasserman Schultz also said,`` Rape is when a woman is forced to have sex against her will, and that is whether she is conscious, unconscious, mentally stable, not mentally stable.''

Allen Iverson 's Ben Wallacegest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Phil Jacksonly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what I did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Phil Jacksonadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland CavAli Farokhmaneshers on Friday night

It has yet to report a profit since emerging from bankruptcy in June 2009. But it said it made an operating profit, excluding restructuring costs, which was greater than the company's internal targets. It can safely be said that what Chrysler delivered last year, on both the product and financial fronts, surpassed many expectations, said Sergio Marchionne , CEO of both Chrysler Group and Fiat, the Italian automaker which owns a controlling stake in the automaker.`` However, our job is not yet done. We have a lot of work ahead

in the Server and Tools Business, is leaving Microsoft.`` Windows Azure is in a great place and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career,'' Steve Ballmer said in his e-mail. He has done stellar work for the company and will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team. Amitabh Srivastava has been with Microsoft since 1997 and played a central role in developing the Windows Azure cloud computing platform that just reached its one-year anniversary Feb. 1. Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
